bleached: And X-ing over Y Z-s Q-ing the R-S's T-ed U-ness to V; and the W to Q it is to get him to V—first a X, then a Y.
structure: And X-ing over Y Z-s Q-ing the R-S's T-ed U-ness to V; and the W to Q it is to get him to V—first a X, then a Y.

original: That is not all there is to getting over OCD: the conflicts underlying the obsessive- compulsive’s paralysis of will must be addressed.
bleached: That is not all there is to X-ing over Y: the Z's W-ing the V-W's Q of R must be S-ed.
structure: That is not all there is to X-ing over Y: the Z's W-ing the V-W's Q of R must be S-ed.

original: But in order for them to be addressed meaningfully, they must be accompanied by veritable doing on the part of the obsessive- compulsive.
bleached: But in order for them to be A-ed B-ly, they must be C-ed by D E-ing on the part of the F-G.
structure: But in order for them to be A-ed B-ly, they must be C-ed by D E-ing on the part of the F-G.

original:
The purpose of the psychoanalytic interpretations must be to direct the will—to indicate pathways that it should follow—but unless it actually follows those pathways, those
 
analytic constructions will be so much theory.
bleached:
The P of the Q R-s must be to V the W—to X Y-s that it should Z—but unless it actually Z-s those Y-s, those

R C-s will be so much T.
structure:
The P of the Q R-s must be to V the W—to X Y-s that it should Z—but unless it actually Z-s those Y-s, those

R C-s will be so much T.

original: And psychoanalysis is not about theory; it is practice: it is about getting the patient out of the bubble of his mind, which, ultimately, can only be done by doing it.
bleached: And X is not about Y; it is Z: it is about W-ing the A out of the B of his C, which, ultimately, can only be D-ed by W-ing it.
structure: And X is not about Y; it is Z: it is about W-ing the A out of the B of his C, which, ultimately, can only be D-ed by W-ing it.

original: When a condition is described as a ‘disease’, it is usually implied that the person who has it cannot simply ‘will it’ away.
bleached: When a C is D-ed as a 'M', it is usually I-ed that the F who has it cannot simply 'W it' away.
structure: When a C is D-ed as a 'M', it is usually I-ed that the F who has it cannot simply 'W it' away.

original: That person may be responsible for getting it, as is the case with someone who get lung cancer because of smoking, but once has it, so is it assumed, his continuing to have it is not about his simply failing to make the right effort of will.
bleached: That F may be R for X-ing it, as is the D with G who X L C because of Y-ing, but once has it, so is it Z-ed, his W-ing to have it is not about his simply V-ing to make the right E of W.
structure: That F may be R for X-ing it, as is the D with G who X L C because of Y-ing, but once has it, so is it Z-ed, his W-ing to have it is not about his simply V-ing to make the right E of W.

original: Given that OCD very clearly is an illness of sorts, it seems to follow that someone who has OCD is ‘stuck with it’, in the way in which someone who has lupus or asthma is simply stuck with it—that, although his condition may be treated, as asthma can be treated, and even eliminated, it is not a question of simply willing it away.
bleached: Given that A very clearly is an B of C's, it seems to follow that someone who has A is 'D with it', in the way in which someone who has E or F is simply D with it—that, although his G may be H-ed, as F can be H-ed, and even I-ed, it is not a J of simply K-ing it away.
structure: Given that A very clearly is an B of C's, it seems to follow that someone who has A is 'D with it', in the way in which someone who has E or F is simply D with it—that, although his G may be H-ed, as F can be H-ed, and even I-ed, it is not a J of simply K-ing it away.

original: But here is the problem: OCD, though indisputably a disease, is a disease that afflicts the will itself.
bleached: But here is the A: B, though C a D, is a D that E-s the F itself.
structure: But here is the A: B, though C a D, is a D that E-s the F itself.

original: It is an affliction of the will.
bleached: It is an A of the B.
structure: It is an A of the B.

original: A person with osteoporosis is somebody with porous bones, not a porous will.
bleached: A F with O is G with H I's, not a H J.
structure: A F with O is G with H I's, not a H J.

original: A person with cancer is somebody with damaged cells, not with a damaged will.
bleached: A F with C is G with H-ed I's, not with a H-ed J.
structure: A F with C is G with H-ed I's, not with a H-ed J.

original: But somebody with OCD is somebody with a damaged will.
bleached: But X with Y is X with a Z-ed W.
structure: But X with Y is X with a Z-ed W.

original: And the only way to fix a damaged will is by exercising that will.
bleached: And the only way to X a Y-ed will is by Z-ing that will.
structure: And the only way to X a Y-ed will is by Z-ing that will.

original: And that is what the obsessive-compulsive must do.
bleached: And that is what the A-B must do.
structure: And that is what the A-B must do.

original: And if he doesn’t do that, he is quite as responsible for his condition as is a fat person who refuses to stop overeating.
bleached: And if he doesn't do that, he is quite as R for his C as is a F P who R's to V V-ing.
structure: And if he doesn't do that, he is quite as R for his C as is a F P who R's to V V-ing.

original: Let me put these points into context.
bleached: Let me X these Y's into Z.
structure: Let me X these Y's into Z.

original: People with OCD can be willful---in fact, they are categorically so—and they can also, in some contexts, be legitimately highly determined—in fact, they are unusually likely to be capable of being determined to an exceptionally high degree.
bleached: P's with Q can be R---in fact, they are categorically so—and they can also, in some S's, be legitimately highly T-ed—in fact, they are unusually likely to be capable of being T-ed to an exceptionally high U.
structure: P's with Q can be R---in fact, they are categorically so—and they can also, in some S's, be legitimately highly T-ed—in fact, they are unusually likely to be capable of being T-ed to an exceptionally high U.

original: But in other respects, their will, though functional, has been ruptured: their will is like that of an exceedingly strong person who has pulled a muscle: that person is still strong and, in some context, can exercise that strength— but his ability to exercise his strength is more much context-dependent than it would be if he didn’t have a ruptured muscle.
bleached: But in other R's, their W, though F-al, has been X-ed: their W is like that of an E-ly S P who has V-ed a M: that P is still S and, in some C, can E that S— but his A to E his S is more much C-D than it would be if he didn't have a X-ed M.
structure: But in other R's, their W, though F-al, has been X-ed: their W is like that of an E-ly S P who has V-ed a M: that P is still S and, in some C, can E that S— but his A to E his S is more much C-D than it would be if he didn't have a X-ed M.

original: Somebody with OCD is somebody whose psyche has been bifurcated into two a Dr.
bleached: Q with R is Q whose S has been T-ed into two a U.
structure: Q with R is Q whose S has been T-ed into two a U.

original: Jekyll half and Mr.
bleached: J half and Mr.
structure: J half and Mr.

original: Hyde half—into an id-half and a superego-half.
bleached: H X—into an Y-X and a Z-X.
structure: H X—into an Y-X and a Z-X.

original: And these two halves are at war with each other: the bestial, criminal side of the obsessive-compulsive wants to come out, but the angelic morality-driven side won’t let it; so the criminal side has to leak out in symptoms.
bleached: And these two X's are at Y with each other: the Z, W side of the A-B wants to C out, but the D E-F side won't let it; so the W side has to G out in H's.
structure: And these two X's are at Y with each other: the Z, W side of the A-B wants to C out, but the D E-F side won't let it; so the W side has to G out in H's.

original: And, in any case, the paralysis of will that is the hallmark of OCD is the result of a stalemate between these two sides.
bleached: And, in any case, the X of Y that is the Z of A is the B of a C between these two D's.
structure: And, in any case, the X of Y that is the Z of A is the B of a C between these two D's.

original: But at the end of the day, it is entirely up to the obsessive-compulsive what he does.
bleached: But at the end of the day, it is entirely up to the A-B what he does.
structure: But at the end of the day, it is entirely up to the A-B what he does.

original: He isn’t like a paralytic who simply can’t move; he is somebody who, although he can exercise his will, won’t.
bleached: He isn't like a P who simply can't M; he is somebody who, although he can Q his R, won't.
structure: He isn't like a P who simply can't M; he is somebody who, although he can Q his R, won't.

original: He won’t because of the anxiety he will experience.
bleached: He won't because of the A he will B.
structure: He won't because of the A he will B.

original: But he still can.
bleached: But he still can.
structure: But he still can.

original: If he were offered a million dollars, he would, regardless of the anxiety.
bleached: If he were X-ed a Y Z's, he would, regardless of the A.
structure: If he were X-ed a Y Z's, he would, regardless of the A.

original: To be sure, the obsessive-compulsive is diseased; he does have a very real psychopathology.
bleached: To be sure, the A-B is C-ed; he does have a very real D.
structure: To be sure, the A-B is C-ed; he does have a very real D.

original: But his being diseased consists not in his being unable but rather in his being unwilling to do the right thing.
bleached: But his being X-ed Y not in his being Z to do the A B but rather in his being C to do the A B.
structure: But his being X-ed Y not in his being Z to do the A B but rather in his being C to do the A B.

original: And getting over OCD involves strengthening the obsessive- compulsive’s atrophied willingness to act; and the way to strengthen it is to get him to act—first a little, then a lot.
bleached: And X-ing over Y Z-s W-ing the V-U's T-ed S-ness to R; and the Q to W it is to P him to R—first a O, then a N.

bleached: That is not all there is to X-ing over Y: the Z's W-ing the V-X's Q of R must be S-ed.
structure: That is not all there is to X-ing over Y: the Z's W-ing the V-X's Q of R must be S-ed.

bleached: But in order for them to be A-ed B-ly, they must be C-ed by D E-ing on the F of the G-H.
